section.section: The Comptroller may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
The staff shall perform the duties that the Comptroller assigns.
From among the employees on the staff, the Comptroller may designate 1 Chief Deputy Comptroller and 1 or more deputy comptrollers.
While in office, the Chief Deputy Comptroller and each deputy comptroller shall be covered by a surety bond in the form and amount required by law.

A designation as Chief Deputy Comptroller or as deputy comptroller may be terminated:
by the Comptroller for any reason that the Comptroller considers sufficient; or
if the Comptroller is ill or absent, by the other members of the Board of Public Works for any reason that the members consider sufficient.
A termination of the designation as Chief Deputy Comptroller or as deputy comptroller is not, of itself, a termination of employment.
